Hydras:

"We should do it carefully... Altough we're planning betray them,w=
e shouldn't upset them before they picked up you... If this plan didn't wor=
k, we'll be alone facin Unicron"

  From: Da=
rk Mouse 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Saturday, April 30, 2005 10=
:25 PM
  Subject: Re: Reclusa


  Reclusa::

  "Oh please. It could be simp=
ler than that.  Let's send out an empty
  pod and have it fall near our bas=
e. THen I simply make it look like I
  escaped.  I could say my pod fell ne=
ar here, you captured me, put me
  through the rinnger so to speak, then I =
escaped.  I run towards them
  and they pick me up. Those little goody-two-=
shoes are suckers for a
  damsel in distress."
